nodes.text: Malosaurs were a species of saurian reptiles mutated from the DNA of malklocs, a similarly massive beast native to the planet Dathomir. However, unlike malklocs, these bioengineered malosaurs had sharper teeth, a spikier back, and predominant horns protruding from its cranial area. Malosaurs also had a more subdued palette of blue and brown.

Malosaurs were creatures in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Little to no records of the malosaur appearing on the live servers exists. However, according to an archived Galaxies forum post backed up on a player website, Designer Mikeel "Hjal" Jensen confirmed that they were implemented.
